projects.name: Quire
projects.desc: My first real project was a group project with 3 classmates. The project's main task was to create a digital notepad website, and subsequently adding features like saving notes, create new notes, textformating, and more

projects.name: Internz
projects.desc: In the midst of our React course of my education at Chas Academy, me and a group of classmates were assigned a project to help students find internships, also known as "LIA" (Learning While Working).

projects.name: Green Hero
projects.desc: At the end of my first year on Chas Academy, me and a group of classmates were paired up with other students from different classes for a project. This project was supposed to mimic the real world, in how UX/UI designers, Developers and DevOps work together, giving each class deeper insight into the other classes and what they have learned

projects.name: PDF Refactoring
projects.desc: During my internship at Clira, I was tasked with improving the stability and performance of their PDF exports, as new opportunities presented themselves. As we moved to a new infrastructure, I was responsible for refactoring the system we used to generate PDFs.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.desc: After my education at Chas Academy ended, I decided to learn a new framework and make something with it. That "something" turned into this portfolio website.
